Object.Field:
Author: Sunopsis Version: 4.0 Last Update : DEC-2004
Description : - Reverse Knowledge Module - Reverse engineering Knowledge Module to retrieve metadata from a DB2/400 database. - This module extracts metadata for: - Physical Files - Database Tables - Database views - Unique keys - To extract the physical resource name instead of the logical table name, you can change "DBXLFI" with "DBXFIL" in the "Get Tables" query.
To use this knowledge module and run the reverse engineering: 1. Import this knowledge module in one of your projects. 2. Create an DB2/400 technology model, and choose the reverse context as well as the knowledge module in the "reverse" tab. 3. Execute the reverse engineering and follow up the steps in the logs.
Restrictions: - Works for AS/400 V4R4 and over

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN_COL ( I_MOD, FK_NAME, FK_COL_NAME, FK_TABLE_NAME, PK_COL_NAME, PK_TABLE_NAME, POS ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :FK_NAME, :FK_COL_NAME, :FK_TABLE_NAME, :PK_COL_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, :POS )

select c.TABLE_NAME FK_TABLE_NAME, p.TABLE_NAME PK_TABLE_NAME, c.CONSTRAINT_NAME FK_NAME, c.COLUMN_NAME FK_COL_NAME, p.COLUMN_NAME PK_COL_NAME, c.ORDINAL_POSITION POS from QSYS2.SYSKEYCST c, QSYS2.SYSREFCST r, QSYS2.SYSKEYCST p where c.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA = r.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA and c.CONSTRAINT_NAME = r.CONSTRAINT_NAME and r.UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA = p.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA and r.UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_NAME = p.CONSTRAINT_NAME and c.ORDINAL_POSITION = p.ORDINAL_POSITION and c.TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.TABLE_NAME Like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and p.TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and p.TABLE_NAME Like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

Insert into SNP_REV_COND ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, COND_NAME, COND_TYPE, COND_SQL, COND_MESS, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :COND_NAME, :COND_TYPE, :COND_SQL, :COND_MESS, '1', '1', '1' )

select t.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, c.CONSTRAINT_NAME COND_NAME, 'D' COND_TYPE, Strip(Substr(c.CHECK_CLAUSE , 1 , 250)) COND_SQL, Strip(c.CONSTRAINT_NAME) || ' Not OK' COND_MESS from QSYS2.SYSCSTDEP t, QSYS2.SYSCHKCST c where t.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA = c.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA and t.CONSTRAINT_NAME = c.CONSTRAINT_NAME and t.TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and t.TABLE_NAME Like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC, IND_SHOW, R_COUNT ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, :TABLE_TYPE, :TABLE_DESC, '1', :R_COUNT )

select DBXLFI TABLE_NAME, DBXLFI RES_NAME, /* DBXFIL for system name */ case when LOCATE('<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>' ,DBXLFI) <> 0 then SUBSTR( DBXLFI , LOCATE('<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>' ,DBXLFI) + CHAR_LENGTH('<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>') ) else SUBSTR(DBXLFI , 1 , 4) end TABLE_ALIAS, case DBXATR when 'PF' then 'T' when 'TB' then 'T' when 'VW' then 'V' end TABLE_TYPE, Trim(Substr( IfNull(Trim( Both From DBXTXT ), ' ')||' '||Ifnull(DBXREM, ' ') , 1 , 250)) TABLE_DESC, 0 R_COUNT from QSYS.QADBXREF where DBXLIB = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and DBXLFI like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and DBXATR in ('PF' , 'TB' , 'VW')
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS )

select t.DBXLFI TABLE_NAME, k.DBXLFI KEY_NAME, col.DBILFL COL_NAME, c.DBKPOS POS from QSYS.QADBXREF k, QSYS.QADBFDEP r, QSYS.QADBXREF t, QSYS.QADBKFLD c, QSYS.QADBIFLD col where k.DBXFIL = r.DBFFDP and k.DBXLIB = r.DBFLDP and r.DBFFIL = t.DBXFIL and r.DBFLIB = t.DBXLIB and c.DBKLIB = k.DBXLIB and c.DBKFIL = k.DBXFIL and c.Dbklib = col.Dbilib and c.Dbkfil = col.Dbifil and c.Dbkfmt = col.Dbifmt and c.Dbkfld = col.Dbifld and k.DBXUNQ In ('U' , 'V') and t.DBXLIB = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and t.DBXLFI Like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' Union All select k.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, k.CONSTRAINT_NAME KEY_NAME, c.COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME, c.ORDINAL_POSITION POS from QSYS2.SYSCST k , QSYS2.SYSKEYCST c where k.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA = c.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA and k.CONSTRAINT_NAME = c.CONSTRAINT_NAME and k.TABLE_SCHEMA = c.TABLE_SCHEMA and k.TABLE_NAME = c.TABLE_NAME and k.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' and k.TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and k.TABLE_NAME Like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, COL_HEADING, DT_DRIVER, COL_DESC, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, DEF_VALUE, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :COL_HEADING, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_DESC, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, :DEF_VALUE, '1', '1' )

select DBILFI TABLE_NAME, DBILFL COL_NAME, case Strip(DBITYP) when 'TIMESTMP' then 'TIMESTAMP' else Strip(DBITYP) end DT_DRIVER, Strip(Substr(DBIHDG, 1 , 35)) COL_HEADING, Trim(Substr( Ifnull(Trim(Both From DBIHDG),' ')||' '||Ifnull(Trim(Both From DBITXT),' ') ||' '||Ifnull(DBIREM,' ') , 1 , 250) ) COL_DESC, DBIPOS POS, DBIFLN LONGC, DBINSC SCALEC, case DBINUL when 'Y' then '0' else '1' end COL_MANDATORY, Strip(Substr(DBIDFT , 1 , 100)) DEF_VALUE from QSYS.QADBIFLD where DBILIB = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and DBILFI Like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and DBIATR In ('PF' , 'TB' , 'VW')

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN ( I_MOD, FK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, FK_TYPE, PK_SCHEMA, PK_TABLE_NAME, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW, IND_ACTIVE ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :FK_NAME, :FK_TABLE_NAME, 'D' , :SCHEMA_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, '1', '1', '1' )

select c.CONSTRAINT_NAME FK_NAME, c.TABLE_NAME FK_TABLE_NAME, p.TABLE_SCHEMA SCHEMA_NAME, p.TABLE_NAME PK_TABLE_NAME from QSYS2.SYSCSTDEP c, QSYS2.SYSREFCST r, QSYS2.SYSCST p where c.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA = r.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA and c.CONSTRAINT_NAME = r.CONSTRAINT_NAME and r.UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA = p.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA and r.UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_NAME = p.CONSTRAINT_NAME and c.TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.TABLE_NAME Like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and p.TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and p.TABLE_NAME Like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
insert into SNP_REV_KEY ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, '1', '1', '1' )

select t.DBXLFI TABLE_NAME, k.DBXLFI KEY_NAME, 'AK' CONS_TYPE from QSYS.QADBXREF k, QSYS.QADBFDEP r, QSYS.QADBXREF t where k.DBXFIL = r.DBFFDP and k.DBXLIB = r.DBFLDP and r.DBFFIL = t.DBXFIL and r.DBFLIB = t.DBXLIB and k.DBXUNQ In ('U' , 'V') and t.DBXLIB = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and t.DBXLFI like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' union all select TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, CONSTRAINT_NAME KEY_NAME, 'PK' CONS_TYPE from QSYS2.SYSCST where CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' and TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and TABLE_NAME Like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
